WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm closing this, if there are specific trinkets that are not modeled open a new issue for specific trinket and model.
WorkItem.Description:
Here is a list of new trinkets which might need some specific attention. I've looked only for caster trinkets at the moment.
 
Can probably assume 45s internal cooldown on all of the following:
 
37660 Forge Ember - 10% proc on all spells for +512 spellpower for 10s
40682 Sundial of the Exiled - 10% proc on harmful spells for +590 spellpower for 10s
40255 Dying Curse - 15% proc on all spells +765 spellpower for 10s
37657 Spark of Life - 10% proc on cast for 176 mp5 for 15s
49622 Je'Tze's Bell - 10% proc on cast for 100 mp5 for 15s
39229 Embrace of the Spider - 10% proc on cast +505 haste for 10s
40685 The Egg of Mortal Essence - 10% proc on healing spells and hots +505 haste for 10s 
 
The following probably don't have an internal cooldown:
 
42988 Darkmoon Card: Illusion - can model as a gain 1200 mana on use (5 min cooldown)
40382 Soul of the Dead - 25% proc on spell crit for gain 900 mana
37264 Pendulum of Telluric Currents - 15% proc on hamrful spells for 1168 to 1752 shadow damage
40373 Extract of Necromatic Power - 10% proc on periodic damage for 788 to 1312 additional damage (like Timbal's?)
WorkItem.Summary: LK trinkets which might need new proc coding

Comments.Message:

Dying Curse, Spark of Life, Je'Tze's Bell, Embrace of the Spider - assuming on cast
